thread.title: Rockdale salutes veterans | | rockdalenewtoncitizen.com

author: Staff Photos: Anthony Rhoads
title: Rockdale salutes veterans | | rockdalenewtoncitizen.com
text:
Rockdale County held its inaugural Veterans Day Parade in Olde Towne Conyers. Retired Chief Warrant Officer 5 Tom Golden served as grand marshal.
Rockdale salutes veterans
anthonyrhoads
